mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_ID, MEM_ID, CART_PRICE) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{memId}, 0)
INSERT INTO DETAIL_CART (CART_ID, OPTION_ID, PROD_ID, DCART_QTY) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{optionId}, #{prodId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(A.PROD_PRICE * B.DCART_QTY) AS totalPrice FROM PROD A JOIN DETAIL_CART B ON A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID WHERE B.CART_ID = #{cartId}
